Page.title: Bedding that cares for your breeding.
Page.description: Healthy birds, cleaner coops, more efficient breeding - it all starts with the right bedding. Pod≈Åapki is a modern sunflower bedding that combines high absorbency, hygiene, and nutritional value, providing comfort to birds and savings to breeders.
Page.sectionIntroDescription: Discover how our bedding raises standards in poultry farming.
Page.greenCardDescription1: Pod≈Åapki's gentle yet stable structure protects poultry feet, combining the best features of various materials.
Page.greenCardDescription2: Limits the growth of bacteria and fungi, safer than peat or straw.
Page.greenCardDescription3: Pod≈Åapki effectively absorbs moisture, preventing bacteria and mold growth, ensuring a healthy, dry environment.
Page.greenCardDescription4: Doesn't clump, makes cleaning easier and maintains hygiene in the coop.
Page.informationSectionDescription: Pod≈Åapki is bedding created for modern farms and poultry companies that focus on optimizing production and animal welfare. Our solution helps increase efficiency, reduce losses, and create better breeding conditions - without compromises.
Page.informationSectionTitle2: Invest in the future of breeding
Page.informationSectionDescription2: If you're looking for a proven solution that brings real financial and health benefits, Pod≈Åapki is for you. Contact us and see if we can help develop your farm.

Page.title: Bedding in Poultry Farming
Page.titleLight: - a key factor for health and efficiency
Page.description: The quality of bedding in a poultry house directly impacts bird health, production efficiency, and final product quality. Proper structure and composition of bedding prevent bacteria and mold growth, reduce harmful gas emissions, and ensure optimal microclimate in the breeding facility.
Page.sectionTitle: What are the risks of improper bedding?
Page.sectionDescription: Poorly selected and improperly maintained bedding leads to:
Page.brownCardDescription1: Excessive moisture, which promotes hard crust formation and pathogen development.
Page.brownCardDescription2: Increased emissions of ammonia, hydrogen sulfide, and carbon dioxide - irritating birds' mucous membranes, weakening immunity, and reducing carcass quality.
Page.brownCardDescription3: Bacterial infections (Salmonella, Escherichia coli, Staphylococcus), increasing flock mortality and treatment costs.
Page.brownCardDescription4: Dermatological issues - foot ulcers and breast blisters inflammation.
Page.brownCardDescription5: Air pollution with dust that harms both birds and farm workers.
Page.informationSectionDescription: Pod≈Åapki is bedding created for modern farms and poultry companies that focus on optimizing production and animal welfare. Our solution helps increase efficiency, reduce losses, and create better breeding conditions - without compromises.
Page.informationSectionTitle2Light: that combines the advantages of the best materials and eliminates their drawbacks.
Page.informationSection2CustomElement:
• Exceptional moisture absorption - limits hard crust formation and facilitates cleanliness maintenance.
  • Reduction of ammonia and hydrogen sulfide emissions - significantly improves air quality and bird health.
  • Natural thermal insulation - prevents cooling in winter and overheating in summer.
  • Structure promoting natural behaviors - birds can scratch and rest in comfortable conditions.
  • Economy and efficiency - less frequent bedding replacement and reduced material consumption mean real savings.
  • Microbiological safety - regularly tested for pathogens, free from Salmonella and mycotoxins.
  • Additional nutritional values - protein and fat content supports birds' health and condition.
Page.floorInfoSectionTitle: What bedding is used in poultry farming?
Page.floorInfoSectionDescription: Bedding choice affects poultry health ‚Äì see the differences.
Page.hackerCardDescription1: effective in absorbing moisture, but may contain contaminants and require mixing with other materials.
Page.hackerCardDescription2: cheaper, but harder to maintain, limited moisture absorption.
Page.hackerCardDescription3: absorbs moisture well, but is dusty and easily clumps into hard lumps.
Page.hackerCardDescription4: modern solution providing better hygiene and lower gas emissions. Additionally, it provides more nutritional properties giving more benefits for welfare.
Page.hackerCardDescription5: popular, but requires frequent replacement, poorly neutralizes ammonia.
Page.summarySectionTitleLight: - better conditions, greater efficiency, higher production quality!
Page.summarySectionDescription: With innovative bedding, breeders can increase production efficiency, reduce losses, and improve animal welfare. Biofloor is a modern solution that truly translates into bird health and breeding profitability.
